001
002import java.io.BufferedReader;
003import java.io.DataOutputStream;
004import java.io.InputStreamReader;
005import java.net.Socket;
006import java.util.Base64;
007
008/**
009 * web temperature setter
010 *
011 * @author matecsaba
012 */
013public class phoneExecute {
014
015    /**
016     * this is needed for cli startup
017     *
018     * @param args command line parameters
019     */
020    public static void main(String[] args) {
021        if (args.length < 2) {
022            return;
023        }
024        phoneExecute a = new phoneExecute();
025        a.doer(args[0], args[1]);
026    }
027
028    private Socket sck;
029
030    private DataOutputStream out;
031
032    private BufferedReader in;
033
034    private void txLn(String s) throws Exception {
035        System.out.println("tx: " + s);
036        out.writeBytes(s + "\r\n");
037    }
038
039    private void doer(String dev, String cmd) {
040        try {
041            String xml = "XML=<CiscoIPPhoneExecute><ExecuteItem Priority=\"0\" URL=\"" + cmd + "\"/></CiscoIPPhoneExecute>";
042            String aut = null;
043            int i = dev.indexOf("@");
044            if (i >= 0) {
045                aut = dev.substring(0, i);
046                dev = dev.substring(i + 1, dev.length());
047                aut = "Authorization: Basic " + new String(Base64.getEncoder().encode(aut.getBytes()));
048            }
049            sck = new Socket(dev, 80);
050            out = new DataOutputStream(sck.getOutputStream());
051            in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(sck.getInputStream()));
052            txLn("POST /CGI/Execute HTTP/1.1");
053            txLn("Host: " + dev);
054            txLn("User-Agent: phone-agent/1.0");
055            txLn("Accept: */*");
056            if (aut != null) {
057                txLn(aut);
058            }
059            txLn("Content-Type: application/xml");
060            txLn("Content-Length: " + (xml.length() + 2));
061            txLn("");
062            txLn(xml);
063            for (;;) {
064                String a = in.readLine();
065                if (a == null) {
066                    break;
067                }
068                System.out.println("rx: " + a);
069            }
070        } catch (Exception e) {
071            System.out.println("error sending command!");
072        }
073    }
074
075}
